author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the Joint Action Committee of Commercial Taxes Associations struck work on Monday as part of their ongoing indefinite strike. Urging the government to fulfil their 15-point demands, members of Joint Action Committee of Commercial Taxes Associations commenced the indefinite strike on Saturday last.

As the State government was yet to accept our demands, the indefinite strike would continue, the protestors said.
title: Employees’ strike continues
